name: ILS Character LCD
description: Control character LCD displays (16x2, 20x4, etc.) using PCF8574 I2C controller with ILS blocks. Perfect for displaying text and data.
author: ILS

documentation.quickstart: Connect LCD via I2C using PCF8574 controller. Use Setup block to initialize, then write text using Write Text block. Position cursor with Move Cursor block.

examples.name: Hello World
examples.description: Display 'Hello World!' on the first line

tips: Row and column numbers start at 0
Most common LCD sizes are 16x2 (16 columns, 2 rows) and 20x4 (20 columns, 4 rows)
Default I2C address is 0x27 (some modules use 0x3F)
Use Clear Display before writing new text for best results
Backlight can be turned off to save power
